GameSir 2023 Recap: A Decade of Innovation and Excellence
In celebrating our 10th Anniversary, GameSir takes pride in continually elevating the gaming experience for enthusiasts worldwide. Especially the GameSir Hall Tech. Throughout the year, we introduced cutting-edge gaming peripherals, including the GameSir T4 Kaleid, GameSir G7 SE, GameSir G8 Galileo, GameSir T4 Cyclone, and GameSir T4 Cyclone Pro. As we embark on 2024, our commitment remains unwavering to provide even more exceptional gaming peripherals for our dedicated community.
Moreover, we want to express our deep appreciation for your invaluable feedback. Your voices have been a guiding force, inspiring us to strive continuously to deliver products that exceed your expectations. Together, let's continue shaping the future of gaming. Wishing you a joyous and prosperous 2024!

results.content: Established year: 2010 Total Annual Revenue: Below US$1 Million Export Percentage: 51% - 60% Location: Guangdong, China (Mainland) Address: 301A-1, Huacui Street, Jianye Road, Tianhe District

Guangzhou Chicken Run Network Technology Co., Ltd.
http://GAMESIR.HK
GameSir has more than 5-year experience in research and development, and manufacturing in the sphere of game controllers. GameSir has already earned a solid reputation for its remarkable performance in the field of game controllers, and grown into the worldwide brand with more than two millions of users abroad across China, USA, Canada, Japan, India, Brazil, Russia, Argentina, the UK, France, with growing number of users in more than 30 countries all over the world. GameSir Mission: Strive to make mobile games easier, to create more fun and to achieve the top of mobile device`s gaming potential. Commit to supply the leading game controller, brings gamers the most ultimate gaming experience. With its spirit of Innovation, Passion and Fun, GameSir puts all effort to inspire people with curiosity, passion for life and continuous self-challenge. GameSir Vision: Spare no effort in creating the first four-in-one unique mobile gaming ecosystem, integrating Content, Platform, Software and Terminals into the industry of mobile games. GameSir, Just Play! ||Less|||||| |
